product_overview: Canada Immigration OS is a comprehensive AI-powered SaaS platform designed specifically for Canadian immigration consultants and law firms. It automates 80-90% of routine immigration practice tasks through a unique multi-agent AI architecture that combines deep Canadian immigration expertise, advanced AI agents, and a comprehensive legal compliance framework. The platform enhances consultant productivity, improves client experience via self-service portals and mobile apps, and ensures strict compliance with Canadian immigration law and privacy regulations.
core_goals: Automate 80-90% of routine immigration consulting tasks for efficiency and scalability
Deliver superior client experience with 24/7 AI support, transparent case tracking, and multi-channel communication
Maintain full legal compliance with human-in-the-loop oversight and a human-approved IRCC rule engine
Enable 3-5x consultant case capacity increase through intelligent automation
Establish Canada Immigration OS as the leading Canadian immigration consulting platform within 3 years
Create a robust integration ecosystem with extensive third-party app marketplace
Provide actionable data-driven insights and advanced analytics
Support multi-language and multi-jurisdictional expansion capabilities
Offer enterprise-grade security, data sovereignty, and compliance features
Drive continuous innovation with self-evolving AI agents and workflows
key_features: Multi-Agent AI Architecture including Mastermind Consultant, Law Intelligence, Eligibility & CRS, Document Intelligence, Workflow Orchestration, Client Success, and more
Comprehensive Case Management System with automated task generation, milestone tracking, and collaboration tools
Advanced Client Portal supporting secure authentication, document upload, communication, payment processing, and progress visualization
Native Mobile Applications for iOS and Android with offline capabilities, biometric login, and push notifications
Lead Management and CRM with AI-powered lead scoring, pipeline automation, and conversion analytics
Sophisticated Document Automation with AI-driven OCR, metadata extraction, classification, quality assurance, and e-signature integration
Powerful Reporting & Analytics including custom dashboards, predictive analytics, business intelligence, and benchmarking
Robust Security & Compliance Framework meeting Canadian privacy laws (PIPEDA), GDPR, SOC 2, PCI DSS, and legal profession regulations
Integration Marketplace with pre-built connectors to accounting, communication, storage, e-signature, calendar, and marketing tools
Multi-Tenant Architecture ensuring complete firm data isolation, role-based access control, and customizable firm branding
user_flow_summary: Lead Discovery → Client Conversion: Capturing leads from various channels, AI scoring leads, nurturing, and converting through consultation and agreement signing
Client Onboarding → Case Setup: Client guided onboarding with profile and family information collection, AI strategy recommendation, and consultant approval
Document Collection → Validation: Clients upload documents via multiple methods, AI-powered OCR, classification, quality checking, with consultant review for exceptions
Eligibility Assessment → Strategy Planning: AI eligibility assessment through rule engine and CRS calculations, multi-pathway analysis, consultant review and client consultation
Application Preparation → Submission: AI-driven form and document auto-filling, multi-layer QA, client approval, payment, and submission processing
Case Monitoring → Decision Management: Automated IRCC status monitoring, client and consultant notifications, handling of additional document requests, decision processing, and case closure
validation_criteria: All multi-agent AI components must be fully integrated, operational, and provide human-in-the-loop controls
Case management supports real-time updates, workflow automation, and multi-user collaboration with data isolation
Client portal is secure, multi-language, accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA compliant), mobile-responsive, and supports document handling and communication
Mobile applications support offline use, biometric authentication, and provide push notifications
CRM and lead management accurately score leads and automate outreach workflows
Document processing achieves >95% accuracy for OCR and metadata extraction, with proper fraud detection
Reporting system delivers accurate, up-to-date business intelligence and predictive analytics
System meets performance SLAs including 99.9% uptime and sub-second response times
Security complies with PIPEDA, GDPR, SOC 2, and professional regulations with comprehensive audit trails
Integration marketplace supports 20+ pre-built connectors with seamless configuration and use
Platform ensures full multi-tenant data isolation and role-based access to all resources
